articles.title: What kind of weather is in store for New England this January? Here’s what the models say.
articles.description:
With January 2026 upon us, and the first month of meteorological winter behind us, you might be wondering: What does the second month of winter look like? Long-range forecasts are often highly variable, but when it comes to whether we’re going to be warmer or colder than average or wetter or drier, these forecasts have […]
